layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 100x60 [color=#ADD8E6] [bgcolor=#90EE90]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 40x20
          text run at (0,0) width 40: "xx"
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 60x20 [border: none (40px solid #C0C0C0)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (40,20) size 20x20
            text run at (40,20) width 20: "x"
        LayoutText {#text} at (60,20) size 100x40
          text run at (60,20) width 40: " x"
          text run at (0,40) width 20: "x"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,60) size 100x40 [color=#ADD8E6] [bgcolor=#90EE90]
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 60x20 [border: none (40px solid #C0C0C0)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (40,0) size 20x20
            text run at (40,0) width 20: "x"
        LayoutText {#text} at (60,0) size 100x40
          text run at (60,0) width 40: " x"
          text run at (0,20) width 20: "x"
